comment:
* Defines a request to peform a network scan.
 *
 * This class defines whether the network scan will be performed only once or periodically until
 * cancelled, when the scan is performed periodically, the time interval is not controlled by the
 * user but defined by the modem vendor.

variables.name: SCAN_TYPE_PERIODIC
variables.comment:
* Performs the scan periodically until cancelled
     *
     * The modem will start new scans periodically, and the interval between two scans is usually
     * multiple minutes.

variables.name: mScanType
variables.comment: Defines the type of the scan.

variables.name: mSearchPeriodicity
variables.comment:
* Search periodicity (in seconds).
     * Expected range for the input is [5s - 300s]
     * This value must be less than or equal to mMaxSearchTime

variables.name: mMaxSearchTime
variables.comment:
* Maximum duration of the periodic search (in seconds).
     * Expected range for the input is [60s - 3600s]
     * If the search lasts this long, it will be terminated.

variables.name: mIncrementalResults
variables.comment:
* Indicates whether the modem should report incremental
     * results of the network scan to the client.
     * FALSE – Incremental results are not reported.
     * TRUE (default) – Incremental results are reported

variables.name: mIncrementalResultsPeriodicity
variables.comment:
* Indicates the periodicity with which the modem should
     * report incremental results to the client (in seconds).
     * Expected range for the input is [1s - 10s]
     * This value must be less than or equal to mMaxSearchTime

variables.name: mSpecifiers
variables.comment: Describes the radio access technologies with bands or channels that need to be scanned.

variables.name: mMccMncs
variables.comment:
* Describes the List of PLMN ids (MCC-MNC)
     * If any PLMN of this list is found, search should end at that point and
     * results with all PLMN found till that point should be sent as response.
     * If list not sent, search to be completed till end and all PLMNs found to be reported.
     * Max size of array is MAX_MCC_MNC_LIST_SIZE

methods.name: public int getScanType()
methods.comment: Returns the type of the scan.

methods.name: public int getSearchPeriodicity()
methods.comment: Returns the search periodicity in seconds.

methods.name: public int getMaxSearchTime()
methods.comment: Returns maximum duration of the periodic search in seconds.

methods.name: public boolean getIncrementalResults()
methods.comment:
* Returns whether incremental result is enabled.
     * FALSE – Incremental results is not enabled.
     * TRUE – Incremental results is reported.

methods.name: public int getIncrementalResultsPeriodicity()
methods.comment: Returns the periodicity in seconds of incremental results.

methods.name: public RadioAccessSpecifier[] getSpecifiers()
methods.comment: Returns the radio access technologies with bands or channels that need to be scanned.

methods.name: public ArrayList<String> getPlmns()
methods.comment:
* Returns the List of PLMN ids (MCC-MNC) for early termination of scan.
     * If any PLMN of this list is found, search should end at that point and
     * results with all PLMN found till that point should be sent as response.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
